Posts.Content: I don't have cancer so I can't imagine how it feels. I have lost a loved one to complications from cancer treatments. I've helped several people with cancer. If I had any stage of cancer I would use The Cellect/Budwig Protocol. Either one will take care of cancer by their selves. Cellect by itself stopped my brother's stage IV brain tumor in 2 and a half weeks. After 2 scans the Oncologist was speechless.Â
Posts.Title: cancer stage 4
